items.title: Zbrush basic Vol 2: Creating a 3D cartoon pet in Zbrush
items.headline: Looking for Zbrush tutorial or course in English where to learn how to create 3d characters, sculpt characters in Zbrush
objectives_summary: You will understand all the necessary phases to model a 3D character, no matter how complex the character is.
You will understand the stages of the sculpture and how to improve your character step by step.
You'll also learn a number of tools and techniques for sculpting and more importantly, you'll know when to use which one.

Learn the importance of colors and how to choose them

You'll understand how to transform them according to the type of character is being developed.
